screen_desc: The screenshot shows a mobile shopping interface for "Newegg" with search results for the "Logitech G Pro" gaming mouse. It displays several mice models with prices, reviews, and a "Save" feature for discounts. A tooltip suggests saving the current search by tapping an icon. There is a filter option and "Free Shipping" promotions visible for the products. The top navigation bar includes options for deals, shopping cart, and account settings.

After that, I will proceed to checkout.
